Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2019 10:02PM Ssc110907 wrote: my biopsy appointment at my SAME clinic was about 1.5 weeks after the ultrasound d and mammo. But my new appointment at a new clinic ( referral to Seattle Cancer Care) was set about 3 weeks after my biopsy report came back. So I think it's going to vary from place to place, depending on how big or small the clinic is.
Posts.Title: Waiting on biopsy appointment Mzbillieb76 Fairydragonfly
